info.description:
fidorpy: Fidor Bank API client
==============================

.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/treespread/fidorpy.svg?branch=master
    :alt: Build Status
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/treespread/fidorpy

**fidorpy** is a `Fidor Bank API`_ client library written in `Python`_. It uses (and ships
with) the `Fidor API JSON Schema`_.

.. _Fidor Bank API: https://developer.fidor.de/
.. _Python: https://www.python.org/
.. _Fidor API JSON Schema: https://github.com/fidor/fidor_schema

.. code-block:: python

    from fidor import initialize_client
    from pprint import pprint

    # Initialize the client
    client = initialize_client('access token', sandbox=True)

    # Get your Fidor Bank accounts
    accounts = client.account.instances()

    # Pretty-print the result
    pprint(accounts)

Useful Links
------------

* Source Code: https://github.com/treespread/fidorpy
* Issue Tracker: https://github.com/treespread/fidorpy/issues
* Docs: http://www.fidorpy.org/

Installation
------------

fidorpy is distributed as a standard Python package fully set up with all the dependencies
it needs. Installing fidorpy is simple with `pip <https://pip.pypa.io/>`_, just run this
in your terminal:

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install -U fidorpy

fidorpy runs on Python 2.7 and 3.4.

License
-------

fidorpy is licensed under the `Mozilla Public License 2.0 <http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/>`_.


Changelog
=========

0.1.0 (2015-01-19)
------------------

* First release.
